options.name: Quick Learner
options.description: When you gain access to a new tier of spells through a Core Module, learn 1 Spell from that tier automatically. This is retroactive for schools you already know.

options.name: Attuned
options.description: Gain +1 Arcanum, +3 Power and +2 Power Regeneration

options.name: Reaction : Inspire
options.description: When you or an Ally make a Knowledge Check, you inspire them, adding a 1d6 Bonus to their Check. This ability can only be used a number of times per day equal to your Knowledge Attribute.

options.name: Superior Focus
options.description: While you are Focusing on a Spell or Ballad, gain +1 to all Defensive Checks and Immunity to the Maddened and Afraid Conditions
